title: An Apple TV/HomePod hybrid with a FaceTime camera could be in the works
content:
Back in 2018, Apple introduced an all-new product lineup to its collection of devices — the HomePod. Due to several factors — including its relatively high price — though, the HomePod didn’t gain much traction.
